metadata.description: Written by comics legend Garth Ennis! Garth Ennis (Preacher, Hellblazer) joins Carlos Ezquerra (Judge Dredd, Strontium Dog) to create a tense war story inspired by the massively popular (over 110 million players!) online game World of Tanks. An untested British crew inadvertently commands an unconventional Cromwell tank into France while hunted by a hardened German panzer unit. Illustrated by comics luminary and cocreator of Judge Dredd Carlos Ezquerra! World of Tanks has a global audience of 110 million players! The global MMOG phenomenon comes to comics!
metadata.name: World of Tanks
